Requirement are assessed as not material, the related topical Disclosure Requirement is not
material.
However, it may be possible to conclude that an individual datapoint (or datapoints) are not
material while the corresponding Disclosure Requirement is material. Therefore, it is possible for
the entity to conclude that not all datapoints need to be provided to fulfill the information
